title: P, MC, ATC all equal at PC long run equilibrium

content.question: Which of the following indicates that a perfectly competitive firm is in long-run equilibrium?

choices.label: Price equals marginal cost, which equals average total cost.
Price equals average revenue, which equals marginal revenue.

content.answer: Price equals marginal cost, which equals average total cost.
